text: This is a list of the 60 largest cities in Southern California by the number of people. This list includes Los Angeles, Ventura, Orange, San Bernardino, Riverside, San Diego, and Imperial counties. The numbers are from the 2020 census. Rank City County Population 1 Los Angeles Los Angeles 3,898,747 2 San Diego San Diego 1,386,932 3 Long Beach Los Angeles 466,742 4 Anaheim Orange 346,824 5 Riverside Riverside 314,998 6 Santa Ana Orange 310,227 7 Irvine Orange 307,670 8 Chula Vista San Diego 275,487 9 Santa Clarita Los Angeles 228,673 10 San Bernardino San Bernardino 222,101 11 Moreno Valley Riverside 208,634 12 Fontana San Bernardino 208,393 13 Oxnard Ventura 202,063 14 Huntington Beach Orange 198,711 15 Glendale Los Angeles 196,543 16 Ontario San Bernardino 175,265 17 Rancho Cucamonga San Bernardino 174,453 18 Oceanside San Diego 174,068 19 Lancaster Los Angeles 173,516 20 Garden Grove Orange 171,949 21 Palmdale Los Angeles 169,450 22 Corona Riverside 157,136 23 Pomona Los Angeles 151,713 24 Escondido San Diego 151,038 25 Torrance Los Angeles 147,067 26 Fullerton Orange 143,617 27 Orange Orange 139,911 28 Pasadena Los Angeles 138,699 29 Victorville San Bernardino 134,810 30 Thousand Oaks Ventura 126,966 31 Simi Valley Ventura 126,356 32 Carlsbad San Diego 114,746 33 Downey Los Angeles 114,355 34 Costa Mesa Orange 111,918 35 Murrieta Riverside 110,949 36 Ventura Ventura 110,763 37 Temecula Riverside 110,003 38 West Covina Los Angeles 109,501 39 El Monte Los Angeles 109,450 40 Inglewood Los Angeles 107,762 41 Burbank Los Angeles 107,337 42 El Cajon San Diego 106,215 43 Jurupa Valley Riverside 105,053 44 Rialto San Bernardino 104,026 45 Norwalk Los Angeles 102,773 46 Menifee Riverside 102,527 47 Hesperia San Bernardino 99,818 48 Vista San Diego 98,381 49 Compton Los Angeles 95,740 50 Carson Los Angeles 95,558 51 San Marcos San Diego 94,833 52 Mission Viejo Orange 93,653 53 Santa Monica Los Angeles 93,076 54 South Gate Los Angeles 92,726 55 Chino San Bernardino 91,403 56 Westminster Orange 90,911 57 Hemet Riverside 89,833 58 Indio Riverside 89,137 59 Hawthorne Los Angeles 88,083 60 Whittier Los Angeles 87,306 == References == * Category:California-related lists
